description: An extension to an Edwardian terrace house in Tottenham for a young family that marries their cultural backgrounds, inspired by Indian modernism.

factsheet.heading: Materials
paragraphs: Inspired by the Indian vernacular, the house has an unusual material palette, with exposed pink blockwork, dark blue quarry tiles, oak beams and joinery and exposed clay plaster walls.
Built on a tight budget, the design makes the most of the constrained area, with each space designed for multiple uses and activities, and the garden conceived as an outdoor room.

travel_info:
Additional travel info: 8 minute walk from Seven Sisters Underground and Overground Station. Follow signs to the Seven Sisters Road exit on the tube.

3 minute walk from the Seven Sisters/ Kerswell Road bus stop on St Ann's Road, number 67 bus.

name: Gulabi House
